title: Widzów
data: Widzów [ˈvid͡zuf] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kruszyna, within Częstochowa County, Silesian Voivodeship, in southern Poland.[1] It lies approximately 7 kilometres (4 mi) east of Kruszyna, 26 km (16 mi) north-east of Częstochowa, and 84 km (52 mi) north of the regional capital Katowice. This Częstochowa County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
